data: Verify that an 'Admit to' Order has been entered prior to completing the powerplan (NOT required for direct admit patients)
q12h, Via verbal assessment only after radioactive iodine therapy admistered. Then qshift and PRN
SBP greater than 125 mmHg, SBP less than 80 mmHg, DBP greater than 85 mmHg, DBP less than 50 mmHg, temperature greater than 38.3 DegC
once, standing weight is preferred. Complete on admission
Radioactive, Radioactive Iodine therapy, Restrict patient to room until cleared for discharge
May be discharged when Nuclear Medicine technologist confirms patient no longer requires radiation isolation
Restrict patient to room until cleared for discharge
Review the most current diet order for therapeutic requirements, food texture and fluid thickness. Add anything to be carried forward to the new Diet Order
Low Iodine, All meals in disposable containers with disposable cutlery and tray
Encourage sour candies, chewing gum or lemon slices to promote salivary emptying (patient to use own supply) starting 24 hours post-I 131 administration
May take own medication. Send to pharmacy for identification prior to use; leave at bedside for self-administration
dose range: 325 to 650 mg, PO, q4h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dimenhyDRINATE - Use with caution in patients with delirium and dementia
dose range: 25 to 50 mg, PO, q4h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: tab
3.75 mg, PO, qHS, PRN insomnia, drug form: tab
5 mg, PO, qHS, PRN insomnia, drug form: tab
100 mg, PO, qHS, PRN constipation, drug form: cap
